name: Zombie
description: You are surrounded by zombies. Unlike the zombies that are out to eat your brains. You can't stay awake forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 - (64 Bit) Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150) Memory: 6 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
